

<body>
	<address>EMF</address>
	<p>elliptic networking</b>

	<article>
		<address>elliptic authentication summary</address>

		<section>
			<address>wallet (offline)</address>
			<ul>
				<li>generate public and private keys</li>
				<li>show public key</li>
			</ul>
		</section>

		<section>
			<address>node (online)</address>
			<ul>
				<li>scan public key</li>
				<li>generate contract</li>
				<li>show contract</li>
			</ul>
		</section>
		
		<section>
			<address>wallet (offline)</address>
			<ul>
				<li>scan contract</li>
				<li>peruse contract</li>
				<li>sign contract</li>
				<li>show signed contract</li>									
			</ul>
		</section>
		
		<section>
			<address>node (online)</address>
			<ul>
				<li>scan signed contract</li>
				<li>verify signature of signed contract</li>
			</ul>
		</section>
	</article>
</body>
